titleStmt.title: Almanack and pronostication. of Iaspar Laet. Of the yare, of our Lord God. M.D.XLIIII. In this almanacke ye shall fynde all the Epystles and Gospels of euery Sondaye and holy daye
titleStmt.author: Laet, Jaspar, fl. 1530-1544.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
